Paris Modern Head Chair
kDesc
Meant to be placed at the head of the table, but you are allowed to put it anywhere you want.[#Legal]
Normalement, on la place en bout de table. Mais vous pouvez la mettre où vous voulez.[#Legal]
Eigentlich für das Tischende gedacht. Sie können ihn aber hinstellen, wo Sie möchten. [#Legal]
Ideale per chi siede a capotavola, ma puoi metterla dove vuoi.[#Legal]
Se supone que va a la cabecera de la mesa, pero tú puedes ponerla donde quieras.[#Legal]
Meant to be placed at the head of the table, but you are allowed to put it anywhere you want.[#Legal]
탁자의 상석에 어울리는 의자입니다. 물론 원하는 어디든 사용할 수도 있지요. [#Legal]
Meant to be placed at the head of the table, but you are allowed to put it anywhere you want.[#Legal]
一般放在桌子的主席位置，但你可以按喜好放在任何地方。[#Legal]
